name: Phantom
wikiSummary: "Phantom" is the fourth single by French electro-duo Justice. It was released on CD and as a download with remixes by Boys Noize and Soulwax. The song contains a sample of Goblin's Tenebre (Main Theme). A melodramatic masterpiece of microsampling and modern electro house trickery. It plays out like a climactic opera and seamlessly links to its 2nd part Phantom pt. II which becomes darker. Noted for it's groovy distorted bass slapping and choppy melodic highs.
